response.overview: This movie is born out of the classic chapter of Liao Zhai, adding many details, the most important of which is the appearance of the three monsters. The appearance of the old black mountain monster, the snake monster and the scorpion monster adds a lot of fighting scenes to this work. Guo Xin Yan's battle with these three demons is undoubtedly the most exciting. However, the increase of these scenes will not make the main line-the love story between Ning Cai Chen and Nie Xiao Qian disgraced, on the contrary, this numerous obstacles can highlight the two people's unswerving death. Although it is no longer separated by heaven and man, it is a ladyboy who has a different route. Whether the sadistic love between Nie Xiao Qian and Ning Cai Chen, played by Guo Xin Yan, can blossom or not is still the biggest attraction of the film.
response.title: The Beautiful Female Fox
